item.title: Elena Escalada
item.description: Graphic Designer, with extensive experience in brand identity, user interface design, and digital visuals, combining creativity and functionality to craft impactful designs.

item.title: Tom Estelrich
item.description: Software Engineer, based in Switzerland and specializing in Apple platforms, with a strong background in building high-performance applications and scalable solutions.
